name: Security Camera Video
summary: Learn about .MEDIA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Individuals and families use Littlelf and LARKKEY cameras for home security purposes. The MEDIA files these cameras create often contain recordings of the inside or outside of someone's house.

description: A MEDIA file is a video created by one of several Wi-Fi-enabled security cameras. It contains footage recorded by the camera. MEDIA files are known to be created by Littlelf and LARKKEY cameras, which are sold on Amazon.com.

instructions: Most MEDIA files can be played only by the software included with the camera that created them. However, if you do not have access to your camera's software, you can try to convert your MEDIA file to a more common video format using FFmpeg (multiplatform). You can then play the converted video using FFmpeg or VLC media player (multiplatform).
